thread.title: Morning Technical Insight on These Electric Utilities Stocks -- Pinnacle West Capital, Portland General Electric, SCANA, and AES Corp.

author: cnbc.com
title: Morning Technical Insight on These Electric Utilities Stocks -- Pinnacle West Capital, Portland General Electric, SCANA, and AES Corp.

organizations.name: wallstequities.com on pinnacle west capital corp.

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 06, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on PNW, POR, SCG, and AES which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Research reports have been issued by WallStEquities.com on Pinnacle West Capital Corp. (NYSE: PNW), Portland General Electric Co. (NYSE: POR), SCANA Corp. (NYSE: SCG), and The AES Corp. (NYSE: AES). These companies operate in the Electric Utilities space, which is engaged in electricity generation and distribution for sale generally in a regulated market. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Pinnacle West Capital
Phoenix, Arizona headquartered Pinnacle West Capital Corp.'s shares saw a decline of 2.25%, finishing Monday's trading session at $75.98. A total volume of 897,442 shares was traded, which was higher than their three months average volume of 665,620 shares. The stock is trading below its 50-day moving average by 10.42%. Moreover, shares of the Company, which through its subsidiary, Arizona Public Service Company, provides retail and wholesale electric services primarily in the state of Arizona, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 24.30.
On January 19 th , 2018, Pinnacle West Capital announced that it has updated the start time for Management's live webcast and conference call to discuss its 2017 financial results and recent developments. The new start time will be 11:00 a.m. ET on February 23 rd , 2018. Earlier that same morning, before US financial markets open, the Company will release its Q4 2017 and full-year financial results.
On January 29 th , 2018, research firm Williams Capital Group reiterated its 'Hold' rating on the Company's stock with a decrease of the target price from $87 a share to $84 a share. Get the full research report on PNW for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=PNW
Portland General Electric
On Monday, shares in Portland, Oregon headquartered Portland General Electric Co. recorded a trading volume of 1.05 million shares, which was above their three months average volume of 660,420 shares. The stock ended the session 1.91% lower at $40.61. The Company's shares are trading 10.61% below their 50-day moving average. Furthermore, shares of the Company, which engages in the generation, wholesale purchase, transmission, distribution, and retail sale of electricity in the state of Oregon, have an RSI of 23.98.
On January 09 th , 2018, Portland General Electric announced that it will release its Q4 and full-year 2017 earnings summary on February 16 th , 2018, before the US financial markets open. The Company will host an analyst conference call and webcast at 11:00 a.m. ET that same day to review these results. The conference call webcast can be accessed under the "Events & Presentations" tab of the Company's investor website. To experience our free membership services anytime/ anywhere and access the free report on POR, click to register at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=POR
SCANA
Shares in Cayce, South Carolina-based SCANA Corp. closed at $37.44, down 4.42% from the last trading session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 2.57 million shares. The Company's shares are trading 12.06% below their 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of SCANA, which through its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and sale of electricity to retail and wholesale customers in South Carolina, have an RSI of 34.20.
On January 23 rd , 2018, SCANA announced that it will release its Q4 and full-year 2017 earnings on February 22 nd , 2018, before the market opens. Due to the pending combination with Dominion Energy, Inc., the Company will not be hosting a conference call. Join our big investor community at Wall St. Equities today and get your free report on SCG at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=SCG
AES Corp.
Arlington, Virginia headquartered The AES Corp.'s stock ended 4.68% lower at $10.60. A total volume of 15.62 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 8.38 million shares. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 2.99%. Furthermore, shares of AES Corp., which operates as a diversified power generation and utility company, have an RSI of 39.26.
On January 26 th , 2018, AES Corp. announced that it will host a conference call on February 27 th , 2018, at 9:00 a.m. EST to review its Q4 and full-year 2017 financial results. The conference call and presentation materials will be available under the "Presentations and Webcasts" tab of the Company's investor website. Know more about AES in our free research coverage at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=AES
--
